roleset.name: cause to fall down
roleset.note: FELL-V NOTES: Another example of old Germanic ablaut as making a causative verb(set/sit(/seat), raise/rise being the others). Beautiful! (from fell.01-v)

example.name: passive
example.text: Richard Secord, [the retired Air Force general]-1 felled *trace*-1 in the Iran-Contra scandal, is all but ruined -- forced to sell his Virginia home and pull his kids out of college, according to a recent fund-raising appeal sent out on his behalf.
